title: Show Your Work: Improved Reporting of Experimental Results
authors: Dodge, J., Gururangan, S., Card, D., Schwartz, R., & Smith, N. A.
key_insight: Reporting only the best result from a hyperparameter search (seed hacking) creates a false impression of performance.
application: Explains why 'best of N' reporting is a statistical manipulation.

title: Google Gemini 'Hands-on' Demo
key_insight: The video was edited to speed up latency and used still frames instead of live video, misrepresenting real-time capabilities.
application: Primary real-world example of 'Demo-to-Production Leap' via cherry-picking.

title: Open LLM Leaderboard Contamination
key_insight: Models finetuned on test set questions to game the leaderboard (Goodhart's Law).
application: Illustrates 'Metric Hacking' and the need for held-out evaluation sets.
